prompt:
Patient: That's why I'm coming in to get the colonoscopy.

Nurse: Hold on a second while I figure out how I can best support you.

Nurse: I see, Mr. Valenzuela. When did the diarrhea start?

Patient: It's been a couple of weeks.

Nurse: I see, Mr. Valenzuela. Is the diarrhea chronic, or does it come and go?

Patient: It seems to be chronic this time.

Nurse: I'm sorry to hear that, Mr. Valenzuela. Have you noticed any blood in your stool during this time?

Patient: No.

responses.gpt4: I understand. Have you recently travelled anywhere or eaten anything out of your usual diet that might explain this change?
responses.our_model: Give me a moment while I figure out how I can best help you. Just give me a second to work out the best way I can assist you.
